entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 60 gusting to 90 in the evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
